original_title: 本当にいる! 地縛霊 呪われた投稿映像集
overview: A couple on a date who visited an abandoned tunnel of a haunted spot. Evil spirits nesting there attack one after another! … “Woman in White”. A contributor who bought a new smartphone. When I was taking a test shot near the railroad crossing near the triangle zone, there was a fear! ? … Includes 8 carefully selected videos.
title: It's Really There! Earth-Bounded Spirit - Cursed Posted Video Collection
